ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISBLANK( os_Winning_Inquiry__c ), OR ( (ISPICKVAL(os_Closing_Status__c ,"Contract Approval")), (ISPICKVAL(os_Closing_Status__c ,"In Transfer")), (ISPICKVAL(os_Closing_Status__c ,"Pending Finance")), (ISPICKVAL(os_Closing_Status__c ,"Rented")), (ISPICKVAL(os_Closing_Status__c ,"Closed")), (ISPICKVAL(os_Closing_Status__c ,"Cancelled")), (ISPICKVAL(os_Closing_Status__c ,"Contract Request")) ))
